originalText.text: Dr. Patel is so compassionate makes me feel very confortable and she remembers everything! I like that she doesn’t rush me and is on top of my health ensuring I follow up with all other doctors. Thank you for your excellent medical expertise and for caring for not only me but all your patients.

I like that she doesn’t rush me and is on top of my health ensuring I follow up with all other doctors. Thank you for your excellent medical expertise and for caring for not only me but all your patients.

originalText.text:
I recently booked my first annual physical with Dr. Patel, which I was assured would be fully covered since my insurance was in-network. I came in expecting just a physical, and communicated that to everyone I talked to, including Dr. Patel. When Dr. Patel walked into the room, she immediately started trying to upsell me to see MOM and other specialists like dermatologists and allergists even though I had no issues in any of those areas that would warrant those visits. Then, she ordered an extraneous service with another MOM department since she thought she heard something odd with her tools. I didn’t argue since I was pretty scared by her prelim diagnosis. Then the other department came back saying there was no problem.

A week later, I was hit with a $1.3k bill from MOM- this is after the portion covered by my in-network insurance.

This was quite literally the worst doctor’s experience I’ve ever had, and would recommend to steer clear unless you want to be scared into paying for services you don’t need.

UPDATE: I reached out to Stephanie, and she connected me with Mary, the billing manager, who provided me with a detailed breakdown of my bill and helped get me a discount. Triple check with your insurance on which services are covered for an annual physical before going here and be careful what you consent to.

originalText.text: I really enjoyed my physical with Dr Patel. She was very kind and thorough and has a great bed side manner. The wait time was minimal and I definitely recommend!

text.text: I really enjoyed my physical with Dr Patel. She was very kind and thorough and has a great bed side manner. The wait time was minimal and I definitely recommend!

originalText.text: I hadn't had a check-up in a while and she made it so easy and seamless! My follow up was equally lovely. I know exactly how to move forward and take charge of my health!

text.text: I hadn't had a check-up in a while and she made it so easy and seamless! My follow up was equally lovely. I know exactly how to move forward and take charge of my health!

originalText.text: Extremely attentive & great bedside manner. Dr. Patel took the time to listen to my concerns and develop a plan of action that fitted my needs. Will definitely be coming back.

text.text: Extremely attentive & great bedside manner. Dr. Patel took the time to listen to my concerns and develop a plan of action that fitted my needs. Will definitely be coming back.
